title: S.Korea raises Seoul COVID-19 curbs to top level, new cases set 2nd straight national record
content:
1. S.Korea raises Seoul COVID-19 curbs to top level, new cases set 2nd straight national record  Reuters
  2. S.Korea eyes semi-lockdown in Seoul as COVID-19 cases hit daily record  Yahoo! Voices
  3. South Korea records highest Covid case numbers as wave of infections sweeps Asia Pacific  The Guardian
  4. COVID-19 cases break record for 2nd day, wider Seoul under semi-lockdown  The Korea Herald
  5. South Korea Investigates 33 Individuals for Illicit $1.5 Billion Crypto Transactions  CryptoPotato
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 韓国、ソウルのCOVID-19抑制策をトップレベルに引き上げ、新規感染者数は2年連続で全国記録を更新
韩国将首尔COVID-19的遏制措施提高到最高水平，新病例连续两次创下全国纪录
韓國將首爾COVID-19的遏制措施提高到最高水平，新病例連續兩次創下全國紀錄
